channel.title: Nuclear Dawn
channel.description:
It appears that yet another once was mod is going retail.
[url]https://www.nucleardawnthegame.com/[/url]
From what I've seen its meant to be a mix of First Person Shooter and Real Time Strategy. Supposedly coming 2010. A concept that sound great but I wounder how well it will be implemented.
Also the game looks like that "Realistic" Brown crap.
Discuss.
